You_know,_Ana..._there_are_procedures_we: Mercy Mercy: You know, Ana... there are procedures we could look into to repair your eye.Ana: You're very kind, but I'm comfortable with who I am now. It's a good reminder.
Ana._I_don't_approve_of_what_you've_done: Mercy Mercy: Ana. I don't approve of what you've done with my biotic technology.Ana: I'm sorry you feel that way, but it suits my purposes now.
Angela!_It's_so_strange_to_see_you_in_yo: Mercy Brigitte: Angela! It's so strange to see you in your armor!Mercy: I could say the same for you!
You_seem_well,_Genji.ogghttps://overwatc: Mercy Mercy: You seem well, Genji.Genji: I am a different man now. I am whole.
I_got_you_some_chocolates,_Genji._Swiss,: Mercy Mercy (on Hanamura): I got you some chocolates, Genji. Swiss, they're the best!Genji: Thank you, Angela. Perhaps you could share them with me?
Angela,_I_have_some_chocolates_for_you._: Mercy Genji (on Hanamura): Angela, I have some chocolates for you. ...Not Swiss.Mercy: *sigh* I suppose it will have to do. Thank you, Genji.
Lucio,_I_never_realized_your_father_inve: Mercy Mercy: Lucio, I never realized your father invented Vishkar's sonic technology.Lucio: The Core Tech was his life's work, owned and patented by Vishkar. But it's mine now.
Mercy Mercy: You know, smoking's bad for your health.McCree: Well, I have faith you can get me patched back up, doc.
Mei,_you_haven't_aged_a_day._What's_your: Mercy Mercy: Mei, you haven't aged a day. What's your secret?Mei: Cryostasis. But I'm not sure if I'd recommend it.
Doctor_Ziegler,_I_don't_think_you've_age: Mercy Mei: Doctor Ziegler, I don't think you've aged a day since I last saw you.Mercy: And neither have you, Mei.
Look_at_all_the_snow!_We_should_make_sno: Mercy Mei (on Volskaya Industries): Look at all the snow! We should make snow angels!Mercy: Why are you looking at me, Mei?
Describing_your_work_as_unethical_would_: Mercy Mercy: Describing your work as unethical would be a kindness.Moira: But the true question is whether or not you can deny my discoveries... No, I didn't think so.
Keep_the_skies_clear_for_me.ogghttps://o: Mercy Mercy: Keep the skies clear for me.Pharah: Let's keep the skies clear together!
Pharah,_your_mother_always_hoped_you'd_f: Mercy Mercy: Pharah, your mother always hoped you'd follow in her footsteps.Pharah: She did? Funny she never mentioned that to me.
Pharah,_If_your_mother_could_see_you_now: Mercy Mercy: Pharah, If your mother could see you now I'd think she be proud of you!Pharah: There's a first time for everything, I guess.
What_happened_to_you.ogghttps://overwatc: Mercy Mercy: What happened to you?Reaper: You tell me, Doc.
Reinhardt,_don't_you_think_it's_time_you: Mercy Mercy: Reinhardt, don't you think it's time you hung it up? You're not getting any younger.Reinhardt: Never! I will fight to my last breath.
Reinhardt._I_don't_approve_of_you_draggi: Mercy Mercy: Reinhardt. I don't approve of you dragging that poor girl around on your adventures.Reinhardt: Brigitte has made her choice. I would have her at my side.
Reinhardt,_what_are_your_plans_for_the_h: Mercy Mercy: Reinhardt, what are your plans for the holidays?Reinhardt: I'll probably visit Torbjörn's family in Gothenburg, like the last few years.
Torbjörn,_I_miss_Ingrid's_apple_pie_at_t: Mercy Mercy: *sighs* Torbjörn, I miss Ingrid's apple pie at the holidays.Torbjörn: *chuckles* Well, it just so happens she has some saved for you.
